name: Olive Garden Tuscan Chicken over Fettuccine
ingredients: 4 each (4 oz) boneless, skinless chicken breasts 1 Tbsp garlic, chopped
1/2 cups flour, plus 1 tablespoon 1 red pepper, julienne cut
2 tsp black pepper 1/2 lb whole leaf spinach, stemmed
2 tsp Italian seasoning 2 cups heavy cream
1 lb fettuccine pasta, cook according to package 1 cups Parmesan cheese, grated
1 Tbsp flour, wine, spinach and cream and bring to a boil. Sauce is done when spinach becomes wilted.
steps: MIX 1½ cups flour, salt, pepper and Italian seasoning in a shallow dish. Dredge chicken in the mixture,
HEAT 3 Tbsp oil in a large skillet. Cook chicken breasts 2 at a time over medium-­‐high heat until golden brown
and crisp (2-­‐3 min). Add more oil for each batch as necessary.
PLACE cooked chicken breasts on a baking sheet and transfer to preheated oven. Cook for 10-­‐15 minutes or
HEAT 2 Tbsp oil in a sauce pan. Add garlic and red pepper and cook for approximately 1 minute. Stir in
Complete by stirring in parmesan cheese.
COAT cooked, drained pasta with sauce, then top with chicken and remaining sauce. Garnish with extra
